metadata.synopsis: This novice has joined the church in the hopes of being elevated to True Soul. She's not here for personal gain, but seeking an actual religious experience - one she believes we've already been blessed to have.

0.speaker: Pilgrim Taima
0.text: I hear you've been summoned for an audience with Her. You will return changed, I'm sure of it.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has kidnapped Isobel and helped return Nightsong and Balthazar to Moonrise. The army of the Absolute is ready to march.NodeContext: Wishing us well - we're about to get our 'reward'

1.speaker: Pilgrim Taima
1.text: I will join your ranks one day, True Soul. That is the Absolute's promise.

2.speaker: Pilgrim Taima
2.text: I will pray for you, True Soul.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has kidnapped Isobel and helped return Nightsong and Balthazar to Moonrise. The army of the Absolute is ready to march.NodeContext: Kind, wishing us well

3.speaker: Pilgrim Taima
3.text: They say the General cannot die. Perhaps... perhaps that will be the Absolute's gift to us all.

4.speaker: Pilgrim Taima
4.text: Perhaps I will be blessed as you are. But if not, I will serve in whatever way the General sees fit.
4.context: InternalNodeContext: Ketheric is still in private council dealing with some cultists who failed him. Default state on player's first arrival to tower.NodeContext: Awe of us

5.speaker: Pilgrim Taima
5.text: You're one of Her blessed, aren't you? To hear Her voice... I cannot imagine.
5.context: InternalNodeContext: Ketheric is still in private council dealing with some cultists who failed him. Default state on player's first arrival to tower.NodeContext: Just happy to be here
